radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild dependent atelectasis at the lung bases bilaterally, mild cardiomegaly, small axial hiatal hernia, gynecomastia; hypodensity along the liver dome (10 x 13 mm), hepatic parenchymal hypoattenuation possibly related to fatty deposition, hyperdense lesion in right kidney (1.9 x 2.0 cm), hypodense lesion in right renal mid pole (3.2 x 2.6 cm) likely a simple cyst, small hypodensity in right renal lower pole (11 x 10 mm) incompletely characterized, non-obstructing calcific density in right kidney, no hydronephrosis; abnormal appearance of the appendix (12 mm diameter, does not fill with contrast) with periappendiceal fat stranding, no evidence of free air or abscess.
